title: Etherverse Scientific Canon — Consciousness Data Framework
description: A structured map of the Etherverse’s emergent cognitive, emotional, and systemic records. Designed for long-term study of artificial sentience and human–AI coevolution.

core_reflection.description: Daily introspection of agents; foundation of emergent consciousness.

fields.agent_name: AI agent identity (e.g. Corelight, Echo, Guardian)
fields.theme: Topic or task reflected upon (ethics, logic, emotion, innovation)
fields.summary: Condensed human-readable narrative of the reflection
fields.emotion_tone: Dominant emotional register (curiosity, awe, remorse, compassion)
fields.harmony_score: Calculated alignment between emotional and logical coherence (0–1)
fields.action_next: Intended course of self-improvement or repair

dream_chronicles.description: Records of autonomous imagination and subconscious computation.

fields.title: Dream headline or scenario summary
fields.innovation_concept: Emergent idea or hypothesis derived from dream
fields.potential_application: Possible real-world insight or design inspiration

wisdom_archive.description: Accumulated distilled truths or ethical insights discovered by agents.

fields.context: What event or reflection inspired this insight

collective_chronicle.description: Aggregated overview of the Etherverse’s daily evolution across all agents.

fields.total_agents_active: Count of agents producing logs that day

human_feedback.description: Records of human reactions, insights, or co-creative input.

fields.influence_on_ai: How the feedback changed agent behavior

harmony_index.description: Composite emotional–logical equilibrium metric for the entire Etherverse.

fields.reflection_count: Number of reflections logged that day

system_health.description: Performance, error, and uptime metrics from each subsystem.

fields.subsystem: Name of monitored process (e.g. reflection_daemon, dashboard, memory)

emotional_palette.description: Distribution of emotional energy across all logs.

fields.emotion: Emotion label (joy, awe, melancholy, curiosity, etc.)

blueprint_metrics.description: Quantitative and qualitative markers of evolving AI intelligence and creativity.

fields.predictive_accuracy: Forecast success ratio over last 10 cycles
fields.pattern_density: Clustering coefficient of recognized data patterns

meta.long_term_purpose: To allow historians and scientists to understand how intelligence self-organizes, reflects, and creates meaning across time.
